headline: 2 Top High-Yield Dividend Stocks You Can Confidently Buy and Hold Until at Least 2030
summary: ExxonMobil's investment plan could add $20 billion in earnings and $30 billion in cash flow to its annual total in 2030.  Kinder Morgan has pipeline projects underway that should enter service through 2030.  Investing in high-yielding dividend stocks has benefits and drawbacks.
